metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the mixed forest station eddy covariance system (EC) in the downstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2018. The site (101.1335° E, 41.9903° N) was located in the Sidaoqiao County, in Ejina Banner in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region . The elevation is 874 m. The EC was installed at a height of 3.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (CSAT3&Li7500) was 0.17 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. Data during February 7 to 11, 2018 were missing due to the power loss.
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.

该数据集包含了2018年1月1日至2018年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网下游混合林站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗四道桥，下垫面是胡杨与柽柳。观测点的经纬度是101.1335E, 41.9903N，海拔874 m。涡动相关仪的架高22m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（CSAT3）与CO2/H2O分析仪(Li7500)之间的距离是17cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。2月7日-11日由于供电问题，导致数据缺失。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散发估算模型将土壤-植被成分合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被的混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散发，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型较为复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测数据，这些数据无法从操作性卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改进了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射计视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了与使用波恩比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果相比的总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层）。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，尤其是在能量平衡闭合不完全的情况下，EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间存在差异。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观测到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计的情况。这通常对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该区域的强对流环境也是另一个因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层组分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，估算蒸散发（E）、土壤温度（T）和蒸散发总量（ET），并随后通过稳定氧和氢同位素技术与涡动相关（EC）测量的结合，更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误引起的，这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还因为在灌溉农田中，当平均H较小时，EC系统的不确定性达到了18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被错误地计为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括离地5米处的空气温度、风速、湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用10 Hz采样频率的EC系统在离地4.5米处测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00之间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）计算得出。土壤和冠层的组件温度是使用热像仪获得的图像计算的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮温。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区是一个人工绿洲，种植有玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于ET的比率，这些研究是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中进行的，该实验针对异质土地表面，属于黑河水联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，与EC系统的测量值相比，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其在发展中国家尤为明显（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域被先前的研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，并支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

background: Accurate monitoring of surface fluxes over land surfaces is necessary for global climate change research, ecological environment management, and agricultural and water resource planning. The magnitude of the surface flux is largely determined by vegetation parameters, soil moisture and other states of the land surface. The major methods used for estimating surface fluxes are field measurement, remote-sensing-based methods, and land surface modeling. The variability in field measurements of surface flux has been documented over diurnal, seasonal, and inter-annual time scales.

Land surface models have been rapidly developed to predict surface fluxes on continuous spatial and temporal scales with physical constraints. Regardless of their specific model structures, all land surface models require observational data to calibrate their parameters and adjust their states. New techniques such as data assimilation are needed to integrate either field or remotely sensed observations with the models, thus improving model accuracy by correcting the model state variables and parameters. Data assimilation has played an increasingly important role in improving predictions of such land surface state variables as the leaf area index, soil temperature profile, soil moisture profile, and other related variables, e.g., surface fluxes.

Spatially distributed estimates of surface flux can be obtained from remote-sensing-based methods. The surface fluxes also can be obtained based on variational techniques and relatively simple models with the assimilation of field-measured land surface temperatures. In a land surface model, the sensible and latent heat fluxes are diagnostic variables, and they are affected by many factors (e.g., model states and parameters). As a new-generation Chinese polar orbiting meteorological satellite, the FY-3 series consists of two experimental (FY-3A/B) and at least four operational satellites (FY-3C/D/E/F). The FY-3 series is expected to have a service life that lasts until 2020. The FY-3A was launched in the year 2008. Visible and infrared radiometer (VIRR) is one of the 11 sensors mounted on the FY-3A satellite and has a nominal spatial resolution of approximately 1 km×1 km at the nadir. The common land model (CoLM) is a state-of-the-art model developed by many groups and validated with extensive field data sites. In CoLM, soil moisture is important for dividing the net radiation into the ground heat, sensible, and latent heat fluxes.

Inaccurate surface flux predictions are highly correlated with errors in land surface temperature estimates. Generally, the diurnal variation trends of the land surface temperature and surface flux can be predicted correctly using the CoLM. The daily averaged evaporation fraction (EF, ratio between latent heat flux and available energy) can be used to describe the splitting of available energy into sensible and latent heat fluxes. The LAS instrument can measure the sensible heat flux at a larger scale than the EC system.
research objective: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux.

The current study constructed a dual-pass data assimilation scheme with an ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) to improve the surface flux predictions with assimilation of remotely sensed land surface temperature. This study carried out the first experiment to assimilate remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from FY3A-VIRR into a land surface model.

In this study, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme was constructed to estimate the surface fluxes via the independent optimization of the soil moisture and vegetation parameters. The aim of this study was to eliminate or reduce the errors between the model simulation and observation.
challenges: Methods are difficult to use for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes because the data derived from satellites are instantaneous and often contaminated by the presence of clouds.

However, these measurements are difficult to use for monitoring surface fluxes at the regional scale because they only produce either point or patch-scale data. The deviations between the FY3A-VIRR LST data and the ground measurements are determined by many factors. The terrain effect can affect the accuracy of the FY3A-VIRR LST retrievals. The mismatch of the spatial and temporal scales between the FY3A-VIRR and field-measured LST can also cause these biases.

The differences between the sensible heat fluxes measured by the EC and LAS system are primarily caused by the energy imbalance of the EC, the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces, and the differences between the source areas of the EC and LAS measurements. Because of the short memory of the land surface temperature, it is difficult to assimilate the land surface temperatures. Directly assimilating land surface temperature to optimize soil moisture may cause model simulations that are more unstable.
methods: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux. Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme optimizes the model vegetation parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 optimizes the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Based on ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF), the land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions.

The dual-pass data assimilation technique employed in this study optimizes the model states and parameters independently. The two passes of the scheme assimilate the remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from the FY3A satellite. With the assimilation of the FY3A-VIRR LST data, Pass 1 is used to optimize the model parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 is used to optimize the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Six Chinese flux observation sites with different land cover types (alpine meadow, grassland, cropland, and orchard) were selected to conduct the data assimilation experiments. The FY3A-VIRR LST data are compared with the ground measurements.

In this study, the MODIS LAI products are incorporated directly into the model, and the vegetation parameters are optimized at the weekly temporal scale with Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. At the daily temporal scale, the soil moisture is optimized with Pass 2 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. The land surface temperature data from the new generation Chinese meteorology satellite FY3A-VIRR were assimilated into CoLM for the first time based on the EnKF algorithm. The source areas of the LAS measurements were calculated using a footprint model and overlaid with a FY3A-VIRR pixel.
dataset: The land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions. The results are compared with those from a dataset generated by a multi-scale surface flux observation system that includes an automatic weather station (AWS), eddy covariance (EC) and large aperture scintillometer (LAS).

The FY-3A land surface temperature data will become the new data source for global water and energy balance research. The FY3A-VIRR LST products can provide the LST and emissivity of each pixel, and the data are stored in a hierarchical data format (HDF), which is a sinusoidal projection with a spatial resolution of 1 km. Data from six sites located in three major nature zones (western arid and semi-arid area, eastern monsoon area, and Qinghai-Tibet alpine meadow) of People’s Republic of China (PRC) are used for the data assimilation experiments.
findings: The results indicate that the dual-pass data assimilation scheme is able to reduce model uncertainties and improve predictions of surface flux with the assimilation of FY3A-VIRR LST data.

The dual-pass data assimilation scheme reduced the model uncertainties and improved the prediction abilities of the model. The average BIAS values of the six sites changed from 28.7 to 5.3 W m 2 and from 16.9 to 16.1 W m2; the average RMSE values dropped from 71.7 to 46.8 W m 2 and from 93.7 to 70.8 W m 2; and the average R-values increased from 0.75 to 0.78 and from 0.66 to 0.82, respectively. The average BIAS values of the assimilation EF results dropped from 0.21 to 0.01, the average RMSE values dropped from 0.31 to 0.15, and the average R-values increased from 0.43 to 0.73. The comparisons showed that the assimilation results match well against the LAS measurements, and the correlations between the assimilation results and LAS measurements were higher than that of the model simulations at the Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, and Jiyuan sites.
backgroundCn: 对陆地表面通量的准确监测对于全球气候变化研究、生态环境管理以及农业和水资源规划是必要的。表面通量的大小在很大程度上由植被参数、土壤湿度和其他地表状态决定。估算表面通量的主要方法包括现场测量、基于遥感的方法和陆面模型。现场测量的表面通量在日变化、季节变化和年际变化的时间尺度上存在变异性。
陆面模型的快速发展使其能够在连续的空间和时间尺度上预测表面通量，并具备物理约束。无论其具体模型结构如何，所有陆面模型都需要观测数据来校准其参数和调整其状态。新的技术，如数据同化，亟需将现场或遥感观测与模型进行整合，从而通过修正模型状态变量和参数来提高模型的准确性。数据同化在改善陆面状态变量的预测方面发挥了越来越重要的作用，例如叶面积指数、土壤温度剖面、土壤湿度剖面以及其他相关变量，如表面通量。

空间分布的表面通量估计可以通过基于遥感的方法获得。表面通量也可以基于变分技术和相对简单的模型，通过同化实地测量的地表温度来获得。在陆面模型中，显热和潜热通量是诊断变量，受许多因素（例如模型状态和参数）的影响。作为新一代中国极轨气象卫星，FY-3系列包括两颗实验卫星（FY-3A/B）和至少四颗运营卫星（FY-3C/D/E/F）。FY-3系列预计服务寿命将持续到2020年。FY-3A于2008年发射。可见光和红外辐射仪（VIRR）是FY-3A卫星上安装的11个传感器之一，具有约1 km×1 km的名义空间分辨率（在天顶方向）。共同陆面模型（CoLM）是由多个团队开发的先进模型，并经过广泛的实地数据站验证。在CoLM中，土壤湿度对于将净辐射分配到地面热、显热和潜热通量中非常重要。
不准确的表面通量预测与地表温度估计的误差高度相关。一般来说，CoLM能够正确预测地表温度和表面通量的日变化趋势。日均蒸发分数（EF，即潜热通量与可用能量的比率）可以用来描述可用能量在显热通量和潜热通量之间的分配。LAS仪器能够在比EC系统更大范围内测量显热通量。
research objectiveCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，以改善对表面通量的预测。
本研究构建了一种双重数据同化方案，采用集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）来改善表面通量预测，并同化遥感地表温度。该研究首次进行实验，将来自FY3A-VIRR的遥感地表温度（LST）同化到陆面模型中。
在这项研究中，构建了一种双重数据同化方案，通过独立优化土壤湿度和植被参数来估计表面通量。该研究的目的是消除或减少模型模拟与观测之间的误差。
challengesCn: 由于卫星获取的数据是瞬时的，并且常常受到云层的干扰，因此使用方法对表面通量进行连续监测是困难的。
然而，这些测量数据在区域尺度上监测表面通量时较为困难，因为它们只能产生点或斑块尺度的数据。FY3A-VIRR LST 数据与地面测量之间的偏差受到许多因素的影响。地形效应可能会影响 FY3A-VIRR LST 检索的准确性。FY3A-VIRR 与现场测量的 LST 之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配也可能导致这些偏差。
通过EC和LAS系统测量的显热通量之间的差异主要是由于EC的能量不平衡、底层表面的异质性以及EC和LAS测量的源区之间的差异。由于地表温度的短期记忆，直接同化地表温度以优化土壤湿度可能会导致模型模拟的不稳定性。
methodsCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，以改善表面通量的预测。双重通道数据同化方案的第一通道在周时间尺度上优化模型植被参数，第二通道在日时间尺度上优化土壤湿度。基于集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF），首次将新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）获取的地表温度（LST）数据同化到通用陆面模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大满、关陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点具有不同的气候条件。
本研究中采用的双重数据同化技术独立优化模型状态和参数。该方案的两个阶段同化来自FY3A卫星的遥感地表温度（LST）。在同化FY3A-VIRR LST数据的过程中，第一阶段用于在周时间尺度上优化模型参数，第二阶段用于在日时间尺度上优化土壤湿度。选择了六个不同土地覆盖类型（高山草甸、草地、农田和果园）的中国通量观测站进行数据同化实验。FY3A-VIRR LST数据与地面测量结果进行了比较。
在本研究中，MODIS LAI 产品直接纳入模型中，植被参数在每周时间尺度上通过双重数据同化方案的第一阶段进行优化。在每日时间尺度上，土壤湿度通过双重数据同化方案的第二阶段进行优化。基于EnKF算法，首次将新一代中国气象卫星FY3A-VIRR的地表温度数据同化到CoLM中。LAS测量的源区通过足迹模型计算，并与FY3A-VIRR像元叠加。
datasetCn: 来自新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）的地表温度（LST）数据首次被同化到通用陆面模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大闸、广陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点涵盖了不同的气候条件。结果与由多尺度表面通量观测系统生成的数据集进行比较，该系统包括自动气象站（AWS）、涡度协方差（EC）和大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）。
FY-3A地表温度数据将成为全球水分和能量平衡研究的新数据源。FY3A-VIRR LST产品可以提供每个像素的地表温度和发射率，数据以层次数据格式（HDF）存储，采用正弦投影，空间分辨率为1公里。来自中国三个主要自然区域（西部干旱和半干旱地区、东部季风区和青藏高原 alpine meadow）的六个站点的数据用于数据同化实验。
findingsCn: 结果表明，双通道数据同化方案能够通过同化FY3A-VIRR地表温度数据来减少模型不确定性，并改善地表通量的预测。

双重数据同化方案减少了模型的不确定性，提高了模型的预测能力。六个站点的平均偏差（BIAS）值从28.7 W m 2 变为5.3 W m 2， 从16.9 W m 2 变为16.1 W m 2；平均均方根误差（RMSE）值从71.7 W m 2 降至46.8 W m 2，从93.7 W m 2 降至70.8 W m 2；平均相关系数（R值）从0.75 增加到0.78，从0.66 增加到0.82。同化的蒸散发（EF）结果的平均偏差值从0.21 降至0.01，平均均方根误差值从0.31 降至0.15，平均相关系数从0.43 增加到0.73。比较结果表明，同化结果与激光雷达（LAS）测量值匹配良好，并且同化结果与LAS测量值之间的相关性高于模型模拟在大门、馆陶、阿柔、北京和济源站点的相关性。

Example.AnswerEn: In oasis–desert ecosystems, data collection methods include the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data. Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in using remote-sensing data to estimate surface fluxes is the mismatch of spatial and temporal scales between satellite data and field measurements, which can lead to biases. Example.AnswerCn: 使用遥感数据估算地表通量的一个挑战是卫星数据与现场测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配，这可能导致偏差。此外，卫星数据通常是瞬时的，并且可能受到云层存在的干扰，使得连续监测变得困难。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model utilized to estimate evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes?
Definition.QuestionCn: 两源能量平衡（TSEB）模型如何用于估算异质景观中的蒸散发？
Definition.AnswerEn: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model is used to estimate evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration in landscapes with mixed soil and vegetation components. It accounts for the partitioning of energy between the soil and canopy, requiring inputs like soil and canopy temperatures, often measured by thermal cameras, to improve estimation accuracy.
Definition.AnswerCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型用于估算具有混合土壤和植被成分的景观中的蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散。它考虑了土壤和树冠之间能量的划分，要求输入如土壤和树冠温度，通常通过热像仪测量，以提高估算的准确性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when using ground-based eddy covariance measurements versus remote-sensing-based methods for surface flux estimation in arid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，使用地面涡度协方差测量与基于遥感的方法进行表面通量估计时面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Ground-based eddy covariance measurements face challenges such as energy imbalance and limited spatial coverage, as they provide point or patch-scale data. Remote-sensing-based methods, on the other hand, can cover larger areas but are often limited by instantaneous data collection, cloud contamination, and the mismatch between satellite data resolution and ground measurement scales.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 基于地面的涡度协方差测量面临着能量不平衡和空间覆盖有限等挑战，因为它们提供的是点或斑块尺度的数据。另一方面，基于遥感的方法可以覆盖更大区域，但通常受到瞬时数据采集、云污染以及卫星数据分辨率与地面测量尺度不匹配的限制。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the effectiveness of using thermal camera-derived soil and canopy component temperatures for evapotranspiration estimation compare to traditional field measurement techniques in agricultural areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用热像仪获取的土壤和冠层组分温度在农业地区对蒸散发估算的有效性与传统田间测量技术相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Thermal camera-derived component temperatures allow for the separation of soil and canopy temperatures, which can improve the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates, especially in heterogeneous landscapes. Traditional field measurement techniques, such as eddy covariance systems, may not always effectively separate these components, potentially leading to less accurate estimates under certain conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 热成像相机获取的组件温度可以分离土壤和树冠温度，从而提高蒸散发估算的准确性，特别是在异质景观中。传统的现场测量技术，如涡度协方差系统，可能无法有效分离这些组件，在某些条件下可能导致估算不够准确。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can data assimilation techniques enhance the predictive capabilities of land surface models, particularly in arid and semi-arid regions, and what are the potential sources of uncertainty?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 数据同化技术可以通过哪些方式增强陆面模型的预测能力，特别是在干旱和半干旱地区，潜在的不确定性来源是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Data assimilation techniques, such as the dual-pass data assimilation scheme, can enhance predictive capabilities by integrating remotely sensed data like land surface temperatures into land surface models. This approach helps optimize model parameters and states, leading to improved predictions of surface fluxes. However, uncertainties may arise from mismatches between satellite-derived data and ground measurements, terrain effects, and the inherent variability of the land surface, which can affect the accuracy of assimilated data.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据同化技术，如双重数据同化方案，可以通过将遥感数据（如地表温度）整合到地表模型中来增强预测能力。这种方法有助于优化模型参数和状态，从而改善地表通量的预测。然而，由于卫星衍生数据与地面测量之间的不匹配、地形效应以及地表固有的变异性，可能会出现不确定性，这可能影响同化数据的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately estimating surface fluxes in arid regions using current data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些因素导致在干旱地区使用当前数据收集方法准确估计表面通量面临挑战？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Accurately estimating surface fluxes in arid regions is challenging due to the heterogeneity of the landscape, the difficulty in measuring E and T on the ground, image classification errors that affect temperature estimates, and the impact of strong advective conditions. Additionally, there are issues with the energy imbalance of EC systems and uncertainties in the derived component temperatures caused by vegetation abundance and atmospheric conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，准确估计表面通量面临挑战，原因包括景观的异质性、地面测量蒸散发（E）和蒸腾（T）的困难、影响温度估计的图像分类错误，以及强烈的平流条件的影响。此外，涡度协方差（EC）系统的能量不平衡问题，以及由于植被丰度和大气条件引起的导出组分温度的不确定性也是问题所在。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it difficult to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems in arid regions, and how does this impact data collection for energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在干旱地区维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡很困难，这如何影响能量、水汽和碳通量的数据收集？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Balancing oasis and desert systems is difficult due to ecological degradation, such as river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, and increased desertification. These challenges impact data collection by necessitating long-term observations to understand energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. The complex interactions within these ecosystems require robust datasets to support ecological stability and socio-economic development.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 平衡绿洲和沙漠系统是困难的，因为生态退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化以及沙漠化加剧。这些挑战影响数据收集，因为需要长期观察以了解能量、水汽和碳的交换。这些生态系统内复杂的相互作用需要强大的数据集来支持生态稳定和社会经济发展。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of employing a dual-pass data assimilation scheme on the accuracy of surface flux predictions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 采用双重数据同化方案对表面通量预测准确性的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The dual-pass data assimilation scheme can reduce model uncertainties and improve predictions of surface flux by optimizing model vegetation parameters and soil moisture independently. This approach has shown to increase the accuracy of predictions by effectively integrating remotely sensed land surface temperature data, resulting in improved bias and RMSE values when compared against traditional methods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 双重通道数据同化方案可以通过独立优化模型植被参数和土壤湿度来减少模型不确定性，并改善地表通量的预测。这种方法通过有效整合遥感地表温度数据，已显示出提高预测准确性的效果，与传统方法相比，偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）值得到了改善。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might long-term observational datasets from oasis-desert systems influence our understanding of carbon exchange in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集来自绿洲-沙漠系统如何影响我们对干旱地区碳交换的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets from oasis-desert systems are crucial for understanding the dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems. These datasets can reveal the role of oasis-desert areas as carbon sinks, affecting the carbon balance in arid regions and contributing to global carbon cycle models. They also support ecological stability and can inform sustainable development strategies in these areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集对于理解这些生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的动态至关重要。这些数据集可以揭示绿洲-沙漠地区作为碳汇的作用，影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并为全球碳循环模型提供支持。它们还支持生态稳定性，并可以为这些地区的可持续发展战略提供信息。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended goals of integrating remote sensing data with land surface models in predicting surface fluxes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 将遥感数据与陆面模型集成以预测表面通量的预期目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended goals of integrating remote sensing data with land surface models in predicting surface fluxes are to improve model accuracy by correcting state variables and parameters through data assimilation techniques, such as the dual-pass data assimilation scheme, thereby reducing uncertainties and enhancing prediction capabilities.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 将遥感数据与陆面模型结合以预测表面通量的目标是通过数据同化技术（如双重数据同化方案）来改进模型的准确性，通过校正状态变量和参数，从而减少不确定性并增强预测能力。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in processing eddy covariance data to ensure accuracy and remove potential errors before analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 处理涡度协方差数据以确保准确性并在分析前去除潜在错误涉及哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The processing of eddy covariance data involves several key steps to ensure accuracy: outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation (second coordinate rotation), frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Data quality is assessed based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics. Data is further filtered to exclude instrument errors, precipitation-related disturbances, and instances where data loss exceeds 10% within a 30-minute period.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差数据的处理涉及几个关键步骤以确保准确性：异常值去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转（第二坐标旋转）、频率响应校正、超声波虚拟温度校正和密度（WPL）校正。数据质量根据大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征进行评估。数据进一步过滤，以排除仪器错误、降水相关干扰以及在30分钟内数据丢失超过10%的情况。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can ground-based measurements be integrated with remote sensing data to improve the estimation of evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何将地面测量与遥感数据结合，以改善对异质景观中蒸散发的估算？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Ground-based measurements, such as those from eddy covariance systems, can be integrated with remote sensing data by using models like the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model. This model benefits from high-resolution thermal camera inputs and stable isotope techniques to validate evaporation and transpiration estimates. The integration process involves using component temperatures from thermal images to model latent and sensible heat fluxes, checked against ground-measured data for accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 基于地面的测量，例如涡度协方差系统，可以通过使用像双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型这样的模型与遥感数据进行整合。该模型受益于高分辨率热像仪输入和稳定同位素技术，以验证蒸发和蒸腾估算。整合过程涉及使用热成像中的组分温度来模拟潜热和显热通量，并与地面测量的数据进行准确性检查。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are implemented to ensure the quality and consistency of long-term observational datasets in oasis-desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保沙漠生态系统中长期观察数据集的质量和一致性，实施了哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure quality and consistency of long-term observational datasets in oasis-desert systems, a structured process is followed involving data collection from eddy covariance systems and automatic weather stations, data processing including quality control and error checking, and data archiving and sharing. The datasets encompass energy, water vapor, carbon fluxes, and auxiliary hydrometeorological data, and are maintained with regular updates and calibrations to account for equipment changes and environmental conditions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保绿洲-沙漠系统长期观测数据集的质量和一致性，遵循一个结构化的过程，包括从涡度协方差系统和自动气象站收集数据，进行数据处理，包括质量控制和错误检查，以及数据归档和共享。这些数据集涵盖了能量、水蒸气、碳通量和辅助气象数据，并定期进行更新和校准，以应对设备变化和环境条件。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate partitioning of evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration in heterogeneous land surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够准确地将蒸散发分为蒸发和植物蒸腾在异质土地表面上？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model, utilizing soil and canopy component temperatures, enables accurate partitioning of evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration. This is validated using stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes and eddy covariance (EC) system measurements.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 两源能量平衡（TSEB）模型利用土壤和冠层组件温度，能够准确地将蒸散发分为蒸发和蒸腾。这通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及涡度协方差（EC）系统测量得到了验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do long-term observational datasets contribute to understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集如何有助于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets consisting of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, along with auxiliary data from hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, are crucial for understanding these exchanges. They support ecological security and sustainable development in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及来自水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据，对于理解这些交换至关重要。它们支持绿洲-沙漠生态系统的生态安全和可持续发展。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways does the assimilation of satellite-derived land surface temperature data enhance the prediction of surface fluxes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的地表温度数据的同化如何增强地表通量的预测能力？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The assimilation of satellite-derived land surface temperature data, such as from FY3A-VIRR, into land surface models using a dual-pass data assimilation scheme, optimizes model vegetation parameters and soil moisture. This process reduces model uncertainties and improves surface flux predictions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 将卫星获取的地表温度数据（如FY3A-VIRR）通过双重数据同化方案融入陆面模型中，可以优化模型的植被参数和土壤湿度。这个过程减少了模型的不确定性，并改善了地表通量的预测。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in ensuring the reliability of eddy covariance data, and why is data quality control important in this context?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 确保涡度协方差数据可靠性可能会面临哪些挑战，以及在这种情况下数据质量控制为何重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in ensuring the reliability of eddy covariance data include dealing with incomplete energy balance closure, measurement errors, and data loss due to instrument malfunctions or environmental conditions. Data quality control is important to remove erroneous data, correct for delays, and ensure that the data accurately reflect the atmospheric conditions and energy exchanges, which are critical for reliable surface flux measurements.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 确保涡度协方差数据可靠性面临的挑战包括处理能量平衡闭合不完全、测量误差以及由于仪器故障或环境条件导致的数据丢失。数据质量控制对于去除错误数据、修正延迟以及确保数据准确反映大气条件和能量交换至关重要，这对可靠的表面通量测量至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of using eddy covariance systems for measuring turbulent fluxes in heterogeneous landscapes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评价在异质景观中使用涡度相关系统测量湍流通量的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems are effective in capturing turbulent fluxes such as heat and moisture, but challenges arise in heterogeneous landscapes due to incomplete energy balance closure and potential errors caused by surface heterogeneity. These systems provide direct measurements, but their effectiveness can be limited by factors such as instrument precision, environmental conditions, and the spatial scale of the observation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统在捕捉热量和水分等湍流通量方面非常有效，但在异质景观中，由于能量平衡闭合不完全和表面异质性可能导致的误差，面临挑战。这些系统提供直接测量，但其有效性可能受到仪器精度、环境条件和观测空间尺度等因素的限制。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges in assimilating satellite-derived land surface temperature data into land surface models for predicting surface fluxes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对将卫星获取的地表温度数据融入地表模型以预测表面通量的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges in assimilating satellite-derived land surface temperature data include the instantaneous nature of satellite data, cloud contamination, and mismatches in spatial and temporal scales between satellite observations and ground measurements. Additionally, accurately representing the terrain effect and dealing with energy imbalance issues in the eddy covariance system are significant challenges.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 同化卫星衍生的地表温度数据面临的挑战包括卫星数据的瞬时性、云污染，以及卫星观测与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配。此外，准确表示地形效应和处理涡动协方差系统中的能量不平衡问题也是重要挑战。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies used for processing and quality control of eddy covariance data in the context of surface flux measurements in oasis–desert systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在绿洲-沙漠系统中进行表面通量测量时，涡度协方差数据处理和质量控制的相关方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The processing and quality control of eddy covariance data involve steps such as data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing. Data are collected using an eddy covariance system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz. Processing includes removing erroneous data, calibrating delays, and ensuring data quality through checks on atmospheric stability and turbulence characteristics. Quality control also involves data filtering, such as excluding data during instrument malfunctions, rain events, or when data loss exceeds a certain threshold within a specified period.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差数据的处理和质量控制涉及数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享等步骤。数据是使用采样频率为10 Hz的涡度协方差系统收集的。处理包括去除错误数据、校准延迟，并通过对大气稳定性和湍流特征的检查来确保数据质量。质量控制还涉及数据过滤，例如在仪器故障、降雨事件或在指定时间内数据丢失超过某个阈值时排除数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges associated with remote sensing data assimilation for surface flux prediction in arid and semi-arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析与干旱和半干旱地区表面通量预测相关的遥感数据同化挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in remote sensing data assimilation for surface flux prediction include the difficulty of using satellite-derived data for continuous monitoring due to cloud contamination and the mismatch between spatial and temporal scales of satellite data and ground measurements. Additionally, the terrain effect can affect the accuracy of land surface temperature retrievals, and directly assimilating surface temperature to optimize soil moisture may lead to unstable model simulations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 遥感数据同化在地表通量预测中的挑战包括由于云污染导致卫星衍生数据难以进行连续监测，以及卫星数据与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配。此外，地形效应可能影响地表温度的准确获取，直接同化地表温度以优化土壤湿度可能导致模型模拟不稳定。
